languages.text: Хелбрут усиливает наносимый {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} инфернальной энергией на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Его {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}атаки в ближнем бою{/g} наносят {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненный урон{/g} и накладывают {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g}.
languages.original_text: The Helbrute boosts its {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} with infernal energy for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} deal {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} and inflict {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Helbrute boosts its damage with infernal energy for 2 rounds. Its melee attacks deal fire damage and inflict burning.

languages.text: 地狱兽使用地狱能量进行充能，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内可以造成更高{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。它的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 地狱兽使用地狱能量进行充能，两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内可以造成更严重的伤害。它的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}会造成{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}，并使目标{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}。

languages.text: ヘルブルートは2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、地獄エネルギーで{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が上がる。その{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}を与え{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}させる。

languages.text: El Bruto Infernal refuerza su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} con energía infernal durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} infligen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño de fuego{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}.

languages.text: Der Höllenschlächter erhöht seinen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang mit infernalischer Energie. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}.

Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} verursachen {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} und fügen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennungen{/g} zu.

languages.text: L'énergie infernale permet au Métabrutus de renforcer ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} et l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}.

languages.text: Tamu Kaçkını; cehennemden doğan enerji sayesinde, verdiği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarı{/g} artırır.
